bnf_parser.callables

Class MatchString

  • java.lang.Object
    • bnf_parser.callables.Callable
      • bnf_parser.callables.MatchPattern
        • bnf_parser.callables.MatchString

  • public class MatchString
extends MatchPattern
    This class checks whether or not a string matches from the current position in the file being parsed. It simply extends MatchPattern by 'telling' it to quote the pattern (the string given to this class).
    Author:
    Hubert Lemelin

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchString

        public MatchString(java.lang.String string,
                   int minOccurences,
                   int maxOccurences)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to be matched.
        minOccurences - The minimum number of occurences the pattern must appear. Can be 0.
        maxOccurences - The maximum number of occurences the pattern must appear. Can be 'infinity' (Integer.MAX_VALUE).

      • MatchString

        public MatchString(java.lang.String string,
                   int minOccurences,
                   int maxOccurences,
                   boolean collectString)
        Constructor which allows/disallows the matched string to be collected.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to be matched.
        minOccurences - The minimum number of occurences the pattern must appear. Can be 0.
        maxOccurences - The maximum number of occurences the pattern must appear. Can be 'infinity' (Integer.MAX_VALUE).
        collectString - If true, the string will be collected via a new StringCollector.
